name: Eva Embroidered Dress
description: Embroidered Straight fit dress with pockets, Gathered at the Bottom The piece is Upcycled using factory waste. The fabric is collected, cleaned, panelled to create this style. Each piece may come with an extra embroidery or patch but the overall look and feel of the piece are not changed. These pieces are a part of a limited edition collection, the stock is made till the raw material is available. name: Shirin Blue Set
description: Description: This set includes an oversized boxy shirt with details on the collar and sleeve, paired with an asymmetric, adjustable tie skirt featuring a side pocket. Together, they offer a chic and versatile look for any occasion. Fabric: Organic Cotton gauge Model Height-5'8 ,  wearing XS-L Colour: Blue Each piece may come with an extra patch or embroidery to save as much fabric as we can. Wash care: Hand dyed artisanal pieces can bleed colour for a few washes, please hand wash separately to maintain colours and hang dry in shade. Made in India: This product is made in Delhi with a fair wage factory. The factory specialises in small-scale production, where we can reduce waste generation and manage factory waste by upcycling scraps into patchwork fabric.
